collaboration.connected: You are viewing the live version of this page

subscription.cantAddKnowledge: You cannot add any more Wishknowledge in the free version. Get a Plus membership for unlimited Wishknowledge.
subscription.cantSavePrivateQuestion: You cannot add any more private questions in the free version. Get a Plus membership for unlimited private questions.
subscription.cantSavePrivatePage: You cannot add any more private pages in the free version. Get a Plus membership for unlimited private pages.

page.parentIsPrivate: Publication is not possible. The parent page is private.
page.publicChildPages: This page has public child pages.
page.notLastChild: This page cannot be deleted because it still has child pages. Please remove all child pages and try again.
page.noRemainingParents: The link to the page cannot be removed. This page must remain linked to at least one public parent page.
page.parentIsRoot: Under 'Global Wiki', you may only add a private page.
page.loopLink: A page cannot be made subordinate to itself.
page.isAlreadyLinkedAsChild: This page is already a child page.
page.isNotAChild: This page is already not a child page.
page.isLinkedInNonWuwi: You have already linked this page outside your Wishknowledge. Please disable 'Show only your Wishknowledge' and add this page to your Wishknowledge.
page.childIsParent: A parent page cannot be assigned as a child.
page.nameIsTaken: is already taken. Please choose another name!
page.nameIsForbidden: is forbidden. Please choose another name!
page.rootPageMustBePublic: The root page cannot be set to private.
page.tooPopular: This page is included in too many other users' Wishknowledge.
page.saveImageError: The image could not be saved.
page.circularReference: The parent page cannot be added as a child page.
page.pageNotSelected: You have not selected a page.
page.newPageIdIsPageIdToBeDeleted: The chosen page cannot be the one that is to be deleted.
page.noChildSelected: You have not selected a child page.

question.save: Your question could not be saved.
question.creation: Your question could not be created.
question.isInWuwi: This question cannot be deleted because it appears {count} time(s) in other users' Wishknowledge. Please contact us if you believe it should still be deleted.
question.rights: You do not have permission to do that.
question.errorOnDelete: An error occurred. Possibly references to the question (learning sessions, appointments, Wishknowledge entries...) have been partially deleted.

user.emailInUse: The email address is already in use.
user.falseEmailFormat: The email address format is invalid.
user.passwordIsWrong: Incorrect password. Please re-enter your password.
user.samePassword: The new password is the same as the old one. Please provide a new password.
user.passwordNotCorrectlyRepeated: The repeated password does not match your new password.
user.passwordResetTokenIsInvalid: The link is invalid. If you have any problems, please email us at team(at)memucho.de.
user.doesNotExist: The specified user was not found. Please verify your login credentials.
user.invalidFBToken: Hey! It looks like the Facebook token you provided isn’t correct. Try again with a new Facebook login. If it still doesn’t work, let us know. We’re happy to help!
user.emailIsInvalid: {email} is not a valid email address.
user.passwordTooShort: The password should be at least 5 characters long.
user.loginFailed: We could not log you in. Please check your email address and password.

route.notFound: Oh no! This page does not exist.

deleteProfile.onlyIf: You may only delete your profile if:
deleteProfile.condition1: the total of all public views is under 2000,
deleteProfile.condition2: and no pages or questions remain unassigned afterwards.
deleteProfile.notPossible: Unfortunately, you cannot delete your own profile. Please email us at
deleteProfile.contactReason: so that we can preserve your valuable content and remove your profile for you.

wuwi.explanation: If checked, it becomes publicly visible which questions are in your Wishknowledge (except private questions). No answer statistics are shown.

supportLogin.explanation: Attention: only enable this if requested by the memoWikis team! With support login active, memoWikis staff may log into your account for troubleshooting or assistance, without knowing or seeing your password.

knowledgeReport.description: The knowledge report informs you of your current knowledge status of your
knowledgeReport.additionalInfo: Wishknowledge, as well as new content on memoWikis. It is only sent if you have Wishknowledge.

warnings.attention: Attention: Image rights are a sensitive topic. Please only upload images that are public domain, properly licensed, or entirely your own work.
warnings.allowedFormats: Only the following formats are allowed: {formats}

wikimedia.info: Wikipedia/Wikimedia Commons offers millions of images under free licences. You can search directly on Wikimedia Commons.
wikimedia.tip: Tip: When you click on an image on Wikipedia or Wikimedia Commons, you reach its detail page. (For certain maps, click the “i” icon in the bottom-right corner.) Copy the page URL.
wikimedia.urlTooltip: For Wikipedia/Wikimedia images, you can provide the detail page URL, the Media Viewer URL, the image file URL, or the filename (including its extension).

license.title: Copyright information:
license.info: We require copyright information to ensure that memoWikis content is freely reusable, following Wikipedia’s principle.
license.isOwnWork: This image is my own work.
license.notOwnWork: This image is not my own work.
license.declaration: I, {name}, the copyright holder of this work, grant everyone irrevocably the right to use it under the 'Creative Commons' licence “Attribution 4.0 International” (CC BY 4.0) {licenseLink}.
license.useWikimedia: We ask you to upload the image to Wikimedia and embed it from there.
